commands.customName: Debug: List files in current directory

commands.cmd: sh -c 'echo "=== Checking parent directory ===" && ls -la .. 2>/dev/null || echo "Cannot access parent"'
sh -c 'echo "=== Checking root directory ===" && ls -la / 2>/dev/null | head -20 || echo "Cannot access root"'
sh -c 'echo "=== Searching for railpack.json ===" && find / -name railpack.json -type f 2>/dev/null | head -5 || echo "No railpack.json found"'
sh -c 'echo "=== Searching for railway.json ===" && find / -name railway.json -type f 2>/dev/null | head -5 || echo "No railway.json found"'
sh -c 'echo "=== Searching for schema.prisma ===" && find / -path "*/prisma/schema.prisma" -type f 2>/dev/null | head -5 || echo "No schema.prisma found"'
sh -c 'echo "=== Searching for nest-cli.json ===" && find / -name nest-cli.json -type f 2>/dev/null | head -5 || echo "No nest-cli.json found"'
sh -c 'if [ -d backend ]; then echo "=== backend directory exists ===" && ls -la backend/; else echo "=== backend directory does not exist ==="; fi'
sh -c 'if [ -f package.json ]; then pnpm install; elif [ -d backend ] && [ -f backend/package.json ]; then cd backend && pnpm install; else echo "ERROR: Cannot find package.json" && exit 1; fi'

sh -c 'if [ -f package.json ]; then pnpm prisma:generate; elif [ -d backend ] && [ -f backend/package.json ]; then cd backend && pnpm prisma:generate; else echo "ERROR: Cannot find package.json for prisma generate" && exit 1; fi'
sh -c 'if [ -f package.json ]; then pnpm build; elif [ -d backend ] && [ -f backend/package.json ]; then cd backend && pnpm build; else echo "ERROR: Cannot find package.json for build" && exit 1; fi'
